message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'll give you a decent share.
Your turn, Alice. I believe a more balanced division is in order, considering the inflation working against you.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a better deal than that. Let's find a middle ground.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Let's end this here.
